name: generate_treemap_chart
description: Generate a treemap chart to display hierarchical data and can intuitively show comparisons between items at the same level, such as, show disk space usage with treemap.

data.description: Data for treemap chart, such as, [{ name: 'Design', value: 70, children: [{ name: 'Tech', value: 20 }] }].

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
